Title: Episode #1.3
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Dennis Kelly, Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea)
Actors: Adeel Akhtar, James Fox, Paul Higgins, Geraldine James
Plot: The gang feel the full weight of The Network's power as Grant is framed for a shocking crime. With nowhere else to turn, they are forced to make a new ally - but can she really be trusted?
